attributes.action: State funded schools must have after school and breakfast clubs as options for parents,
attributes.additional_details: State funded schools should be obliged offer breakfast clubs from 7.30 and after school clubs till 6.30 for all their pupils they should be able to charge for these and keep the money if they are academies or money should be provided to local authorities a d ring fenced for education - this would revolutionise women's working lives
